name: Private Online Dating
tag_list: online, dating, matchmaking, date, referrals, references, testimonials, spark, bliss, love, relationships, romance, scams, dangers, privacy
overview:
PrivateOnlineDating.com is an online matchmaking site using a similar networking model to LinkedIn to help people find potential mates.

Private Online Dating is the easiest and most effective way to meet eligible singles - romantic introductions through your friends.

Temple University study: “63% of married couples met through a network of friends.”

Many single adults value their personal privacy and are uncomfortable with public dating sites such as Match.com. Others, such as those recently divorced simply prefer a more discreet dating experience.

Bios on Private Online Dating are 100% private and only available through introductions; introductions through Sparkbliss are discreet which fosters familiarity, confidence and trust.

Create a bio and introduce it to your friends who will forward it through email.
